subject: Doping (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees’ Alex Rodriguez said he was “disgusted” with the process, in part because the arbitrator had refused to order Bud Selig, the baseball commissioner, to testify.
snippet: The Yankees’ Alex Rodriguez said he was “disgusted” with the process, in part because the arbitrator had refused to order Bud Selig, the baseball commissioner, to testify.
